import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import {Link, useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import swal from 'sweetalert'; function Category() { const [categorylist, setCategoryList] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('/api/all-category').then(res => { console.log(res.data.category) if(res.data.status === 200) { setCategoryList(res.data.category); } }); },[]); return (

) } export default Category;
